cocktail.name: '57 Chevy with a White License Plate

preparation.step: Fill a rocks glass with ice
Add white creme de cacao and ingr2
Stir
Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice cubes
Strain into a rocks glass.
Drop shooter in glass
Fill with beer
Combine all ingredients
Blend until smooth
Garnish with chocolate shavings if desired.
Blend with ice
Serve in a wine glass
Garnish with carrot.
Add over ice,shake and pour.
Add both ingredients to shot glass, shoot, and get drunk quick
Put them them in a glass..
And slam it to tha head.
Fill 14oz glass with ice and alcohol
Fill 2/3 glass with cola and remainder with sweet & sour
Top with dash of ingr6 and ingr7 wedge.
Pour 2oz vodka into a low ball glass, top up with coke.
Fill glass with crushed ice
Add vodka
Add a splash of grand-marnier
Fill with o.j.
Mix equal amounts into a glass with ice.
Pour 2 oz
Gin
Add 4 oz
Ingr1
Add ingr3 for flavor
If you are weak, top up glass with more ingr1.
Pour kaluha, then baileys, then ingr3 not chilled and not layered -- serve!!!
Combine all ingredients in glass mixer
Chill and strain into cocktail glass
Garnish with sliced strawberry.
Shake rum, ingr2, and ingr3 in a shaker filled with ice
Strain over ice into a highball glass
Add ingr1 and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a strawberry.
Pour the rum and ingr1 into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes
Stir well
Garnish with the lemon twist.
Shaken, not stirred!
In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the ingr5, ingr4, ingr6, and ingr3
Shake well
Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes
Top with the ingr1
Garnish with the lemon twist.
Put ice in glass
Pour in shots
Fill with ingr1.
Drop shot glass with banana & melon liquers into a 9 oz hi- ball glass containing ingr3 and ingr4
Drink in one shot.
Rub the rim of an old fashioned glass with ingr1, and dip repeatedly into granulated sugar until it has a good "frosted" rim
Shake a jigger of ingr3 with the juice of 1/2 a ingr1
Strain into glass and add ice
Garnish with a marachino cherry.
Mix the strawberrys in a blender pour it together with the ingr5,kirch and strawberry liquer over ice in a shaker
Shake well and pour in a highballglass
Fill up with the russchian water
Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
Shake vigorously
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, mix and serve over ice into a chilled glass.
Layered in a shot glass.
Poor in the 151 first followed by the 101 served with a coke or dr pepper chaser.
Pour vodka and ingr2 over ice, add tonic and stir
Shake all ingredients (except for the ingr3) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass
Top with the ingr3 and serve.
Put all ingredients into a shaker and mix, then strain contents into a chilled cocktail glass.
Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes
Stir well.
Mix, pour over ice and top up with ingr2.
Shake ingr4, midori, and ingr3 in shaker with ice: strain into rocks glass: splash of seven on top.absolut sex.
Mix well
Garnish with orange and cherry
Enjoy
Add all ingredients except ingr3 to shaker filled with ice
Cover and shake vigorously
Strain contents into ice filled collins glass
Garnish with ingr3.
Fill absolut into a glass
Add ingr1
Add ice and lime wedges.
Stir ingredients together
Serve over ice.
Mix the ingr3 and ingr2 together in a shaker and strain into a glass
Top up with ingr1.
Shake it up it tasts better that way, but you can stir it if you want
6 of those and you will be wasted for the rest of the night.
Combine and shake all ingredients (except ingr1) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes
Add the sprig of ingr1 and serve.
Shake all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker and ice then strain in a cold glass.
In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients
Shake well
Strain into a cocktail glass.
Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.
Add ice to blender (or to glass if prefer on the rocks) then fruit, and fruite juice depending on personal prefference then add the ingr6, ingr4, ingr5, and ingr1
Blend till smooth, rim glass with sugar or ingr2 and pour mixture in
Garnish with lemon or lime slice.
Fill blender up with ice
Fill half with bartons ingr4
Put 10 tsp of ingr2, add 1/2 can ingr3 concentrate, fill to top with ingr1
Blend for 60 seconds.
Mix both the vermouth's in a shaker and strain into a cold glass
Top up with a squirt of ingr2
Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.
Combine ingredients in the order listed into a shaker
Fill half full with ice and shake well
Strain into glass with ice and garnish with a cherry and orange wedge.
Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.
Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.
Pour schnapps, ingr1, and ingr2 over ice in a highball glass
Top with ingr3 and serve.
In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients
Stir well
Strain into a cocktail glass.
Shake all ingredients (except ingr3 wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass
Add the wedge of ingr3 and serve.
Pour ingr1 into shot glass to about 1/2 full
Using a spoon(inverted), slowly pour in the ingr2 until glass is about 3/4 full
Done correctly, the schnapps will flow under the ingr1 for a clear layer
Again using a spoon, but this time right side up, slowly top off the glass with a layer of bailey's
Be careful to place the spoon right at the top of the ingr1 layer and to raise it as the glass fills up
Done correctly, this will provide a layer of bailey's floating over the ingr1
Toss it down all at once for something like a peppermint pattie, with a bang!!! note: best if all ingredients are chilled
Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
Pour the ingr2 and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice
To make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar
Build into a suiting glass, with no ice
Ingr2 on top if wanted
Served directly.
Pour all ingredients (except for ingr3) over ice in a highball glass
Stir, add a dash of ingr3, and serve.
Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass
Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.
Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass
Sprinkle ingr3 on top and serve.
Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.
Just mix the three ingredients one to one to one
Shake all ingredients (except ingr1) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass
Top with the twist of ingr1 and serve.
Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.
In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients
Shake well
Strain into a cocktail glass.
Pour in order into ingr2 cup
Top with whipped creme and chocolate shcvings.
Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
Shake well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.
Pour ingr1 in an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice
Add the wedge of ingr2 and serve
(a wedge of lemon may be substituted for ingr2, if preferred.)
Pour ingr1 and ingr2 over ice in a collins glass
Fill with ingr3 and serve.
Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend at high speed until smooth
Serve in chilled glass garnished with bittersweet chocolate shavings.
Shake and strain
Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.
Shake ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
Shake and serve over ice
Shake ingr4, ingr3 and ingr1 with ice
Strain into highball glass
Add a splash of oj
Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.
Mix together the ingr2 and ingr3
Pour into glass and then add the ingr1 untill you see the sunrise.
Shake ingredients in bartender's mixer quickly, just 5 shakes
Strain out ice, serve in glass immediately with a slice of orange.
Fill the blender with 3/4 ice
Add sweet & sour mix to the top of the ice
Add about 1" of ingr1, 1/2" of melon liqeur, and 1/2 to 1/4" of ingr2
Then blend the mix until it is of margaritta consistency or thinner.
Pour hot tea into a pousse-cafe glass, using a spoon in glass to prevent cracking
Add ingr2, but do not stir
Top with chilled ingr1 and serve.
Pour the ingr2 and vermouth over ice into glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.
Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass.
If you use the whole all spice and ingr6, tie them in cheesecloth
Heat the mixture
Stir occasionally
If you want an alcoholic drink, rum would be nice.
Chill both ingredients!! mix in a tumbler and enjoy!
Just mix the two liquids and sprinkle in the ingr2
Serve either cold or heated.
Pour into a shot glass and present to consumer, they are expected to cover the top of the shotglass with thier palm, raise the glass, slam it on the bar and the swallow quickly.
Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
Add all ingredients into mixing glass, chill and strain into cocktail glass
In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, ingr4, ingr1, ingr5, and ingr6
Shake well
Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes
Garnish with the ingr2 slice.
Pour all ingrediants into a large punch bowl
Add ice and 4 oranges that are peeled and divided.
In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients
Stir well.
Fill glass with ice and fish, add ingr4, ingr3 and ingr1
Do not stir!!!!! serve well chilled.
Blend all ingredients in a blender on high until ice is finely crushed
It should be of a slushy consistency
Pour immediately and serve.
Put creme de menthe into a ingr1 flute
Fill with chilled ingr1 and serve.
Pour all ingredients into shot glass and slam !!!!
Place ice cubes in the hurricane glass
Add the 2 heaping shots of absolute vodka (note: you can add as many shots of absolute as you want!) fill the rest of glass with the arizona icetea with lemon
Stir to mix using a spoon
Drink up and enjoy!!!!!!!
Just mix in the shots of rum, ingr7, and tequila
Add splashes of the three juices, heavy on the ingr1
Top off with ingr4
Crushed ice should already be in glass
Top off the glass with a ingr1 wedge.
Pour ingr1, ingr3 and lime cordial into glass, and top up with crushed ice
Wait for ice to melt slightly and sip without a straw.
In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the ingr1, ingr2, and ingr3
Shake well
Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the lemon twist.
Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
Combine all the ingredients in a large punch bowl with a block of ice
If found too dry, sugar syrup may be added
Decorate with twists of lemon peel.
Shake all the ingredients, top the drink with soda
Garnish with a slice of orange.
In a shaker, place ingr4, ingr2, ingr1, and ingr3 together
Shake with ice and strain into glass
Add ingr5 to taste
Mix in spread glass over ice
Strain and pour in shot glass
Sit down before shotting
Enjoy!!
Mix and fill up with ingr2
Drunk by finns on a sunny day any time of the year and day.
Mix in highball glass over ice, shake well.
Fill a tall glass with ice
Layer the finlandia ingr2, lemon and apple juices, ingr4, and top up with ingr5
Stir slightly and garnish with a spiralled cucumber skin and a red cherry
The cucumber provides zest and looks attractive
This drink, created by timo haimi, took first prize in the 1991 finlandia ingr2 long drink competition.
Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice
Shake well and strain into cocktail glass
Garnish with a cherry.
Mix all ingredients in a pitcher
Mix thoroughly and pour into whatever is available, the bigger the better! this drink packs a big punch, so don't over do it.
Layer ingredients into a shot glass
Serve with a stirrer.
Layer the ingr2, sambucca and ingr1 into a shot glas in that order

Leave ice-cream out for about 10 minutes
Add ingredients in order, stir with chopstick (butter knife or spoon works too)
Consume immediately and often
Nice and light, great for following a heavy drink.
Pour ingr2, almost filling shot glass
Then, carefully pour baileys, using wall of shot glass
This will give the "guinness" its "head".
Shake together with ice
Strain into glass and serve.
Blend ingredients for 30 seconds
Definitely refreshing for a hot summer's day !

Strain into a cocktail glass.
Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes
Shake well
Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

Next pour guiness over a spoon slowly until glass is full

Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes

Shake.

Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

Add crushed snickers pieces, ice cream, ingr5, ingr1, ingr6, and chocolate liquor to a blender
Blend until shake is thick and frothy
Pour into glasses and top with chocolate liquor and whip cream.

Build ingr4, ingr2 and simple syrup over

This is a layered shot
First pour the bailey's into the shot glass
Then take an upside down spoon and touch it to the inside wall of the glass
Carefully add the ingr2
Repeat this process for the ingr3

Serve in a chilled beer mug with fresh blueberries and caramel for topping.

Gradually add 1/4 cup ingr8, beating at high speed till thick and lemon colored
Stir in ingr7, stir in rum, ingr2, vanilla, and ingr4
Chill thoroughly
Whip cream
Wash beaters well
In a large mixer bowl beat egg whites till soft peaks form
Gradually add remaining 1/4 cup ingr8, beating to stiff peaks
Fold yolk mixture and whipped cream into egg whites
Serve immediately
Sprinkle ingr9 over each serving
Serve in a punch bowl or another big bowl
Note: for a nonalcoholic eggnog, prepare eggnog as above, except omit the ingr2 and rum and increase the ingr7 to 3 cups.

Mix well
Chill over night
Sprinkle with ingr1
Makes 6 servings.
In large saucepan, beat together eggs, ingr3 and ingr5, if desired
Stir in 2 cups of the ingr4
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thick enough to coat a metal spoon and reaches 160 degrees f
Remove from heat

Cover and regfigerate until thoroughly chilled, several hours or overnight

Garnish or add stir-ins, if desired

Vampiros may be made in a tall glass or an old fashioned glass

Bartenders may first "rim" the glass with kosher ingr3, which is done by placing a layer of kosher ingr3 on a chopping board, moistening the glass' rim with ingr6 or water, and then placing the upside down glass rim onto the kosher ingr3, so that the ingr3 sticks to the moistened rim
The second step is to fill half the glass with ice and add one or two shooter glasses full of high quality ingr4
The next stage is to add the flavouring elements

This is done by squeezing a fresh lime into the glass, adding a few grains of ingr3, adding citrus-flavoured soda pop, until the glass is 4/5 full, and then adding spicy viuda de sanchez (or ingr5, ingr6 and pico de gallo)
The final step is to stir the ingredients so that the flavours are properly blended.
